basics.name: Corben Broennimann
basics.label: Android Developer
basics.summary: I am a B.S. Computer Science graduate from the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Seeking to enrich others through programs and games.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
Hawaii Community College Palamanui, Kailua-Kona, HI

work.summary: Android Developer contracted to work at Capital One with a team developing a feature for the Capital One mobile app, and its thousands of users
highlights: Learned in house features and libraries through documentation, working with the code, and referring to my team members for assistance
Review and give comments or approval on pull requests both within my team and from outside teams
Created UI and JUnit tests, using Mockk and Mimic, to help automate regression testing
Debugged and refined various aspects of the pluginâ€™s code base
Developed, in concert with team members and another team, several UI screens to introduce new users to the plugin

work.summary: Monitor and teach a group of students afer school, how to fly and operate drones
highlights: Taught children in from ages 10 to 13, how to fly and operate simple drones and larger camera operated drones
Performed various activities and fun exercises involving the drones to help them get comfortable with flying
Had to supervise and manage a class of 5 to 7 children, while keeping them entertained and under control

work.summary: Assist students in learning the material of the course
highlights: Join and manage online labs where students can ask questions about the course and material for the class
Manage an online learning emporium for the students of the class I am assisting and others
Manage, assist, and book customers while ensuring their luggage remains safe
Handle closing tasks, coordinate with dispatch, and ensure the lounge stays as welcoming as possible
Create reservations for customers inside the Robert's Hawaii system

work.summary: Make Sandwiches for customers and perform duties to maintain store
highlights: Crafting sandwiches that please the customers in a timely fashion
Prepare the store for closing at night and the next shift in the morning

volunteer.summary: Help the local library set up their book sales to get rid of their excess books
highlights: Cart out boxes of books out to sales area
Set up the books so customers can clearly see and access all of the books
At the end of the day move the boxes with remaining books back into storage

volunteer.summary: Help educate tourists and beach goers about how reefs work, why they are valuable, and how to protect them before going into the water
highlights: Talking to random people and giving them necessary information
Understanding the reef, how it works, how it useful, why we need to protect it and how we can protect it

awards.title: Youth Citizenship Award
awards.summary: An award granted to a youth in a community who has given back to their community in a meaningful way.

awards.title: Life Plan Youth Leadership Award
awards.awarder: Youth Leadership Life Plan Institute of Hawaii
awards.summary: An award for participating in Youth Lifeplan leadership, where in we helped newer students begin to think about the future and prepare for college and employment.
